name: Petzl Saka Chalk Bag
description: A shapely bag with a generous opening, stiffened rim, and 2 stable loops to stop it migrating away from the dipping spot.Made of nylon with a soft polyester microfleece lining.Drawstring and cordlock can be opened with one hand.Reinforced rim holds the shape.Liner flaps prevent accidental loss of chalk.Includes a waistbelt and double loops for stability.Brush holder holds your favorite brush.
